Module com.example.epj2
Package com.example.epj2.controller

Class MainWindowController

java.lang.Object
com.example.epj2.controller.MainWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for mainWindow.fxml file.

  • Field Details

    • rentsGroupedByDateTime

      public static Map<LocalDateTime,List<Rent>> rentsGroupedByDateTime
      A map that groups rents by their date and time. The key is a LocalDateTime representing the date and time of the rent, * and the value is a list of Rent objects associated with that date and time.

    • invoicesGroupedByDate

      public static Map<LocalDate,List<Invoice>> invoicesGroupedByDate
      A map that groups invoices by their date. The key is a LocalDate representing the date of the invoice, and the value is a list of Invoice objects associated with that date.

    • vehiclesIncomeMap

      public static Map<ElectricVehicle,Double> vehiclesIncomeMap
      A map that associates electric vehicles with their total income. The key is an ElectricVehicle object representing the vehicle, and the value is a Double representing the total income generated by that vehicle.

    • vehicleList

      public static List<ElectricVehicle> vehicleList
      A list of all electric vehicles.

    • rentList

      public static List<Rent> rentList
      A list of all electric vehicle rents.

    • userList

      public static List<User> userList
      A list of all electric vehicle users.

    • dateTimeList

      public static List<LocalDateTime> dateTimeList
      A list of all date and times a rent was made.

    • currentVehicles

      public static List<ElectricVehicle> currentVehicles
      A list of vehicles rented at same time.

    • currentRents

      public static List<Rent> currentRents
      A list of rents made at same time.

    • invoiceList

      public static List<Invoice> invoiceList
      A list of all invoices for one electric vehicle rent company.

    • malfunctionList

      public static List<Malfunction> malfunctionList
      A list of all malfunctions that occurred on vehicles of one electric vehicle rental company.

    • reportList

      public static List<Report> reportList
      A list of daily reports of one electric vehicle rental company.

    • cityMap

      public static Field[][] cityMap
      A map of the city where the rents being made.

    • staticPanes

      public static javafx.scene.layout.Pane[][] staticPanes
      A 2D array of Pane objects representing the static layout of the city map.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MainWindowController getInstance()
      Gets the instance of an MainWindowController
      Returns:
      the instance of an MainWindowController

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes FXML objects on the window.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the URL of the FXML document used to create this window
      resources - the ResourceBundle used to localize the UI elements

    • runVehicles

      public static void runVehicles(int number)
      Starts vehicles that are rented at the same time.
      Parameters:
      number - the ordinal number of currentRent list

    • updateCurrentVehicle

      public static void updateCurrentVehicle(List<Rent> rents)
      Initialize the list of vehicles rented at the same time, using the information from the list of rents made at the same.
      Parameters:
      rents - the list of rents made at the same time

    • addPaneToGrid

      public static void addPaneToGrid(ElectricVehicle electricVehicle)
      Adds a pane to the grid representing the current state of the given electric vehicle. The pane includes a label with the electric vehicle's identifier and battery level, and an image of the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      electricVehicle - the electric vehicle to be represented on the grid

    • removeFromPane

      public static void removeFromPane(ElectricVehicle electricVehicle, boolean addX, boolean addY)
      Removes the representation of the given electric vehicle from its current pane on the grid and updates its position based on the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      electricVehicle - the electric vehicle to be removed from the grid
      addX - true, the vehicle's x-coordinate will be incremented; false, decremented
      addY - true, the vehicle's y-coordinate will be incremented; false, decremented

    • clearAllPanes

      public static void clearAllPanes()
      Clears all panes in the grid, removing all visual representations of electric vehicles.

    • clearAllFields

      public static void clearAllFields()
      Clears all fields in the city map, removing all vehicle lists. Each field represents a location on the map where vehicles can be placed.

    • updateInvoicesDateMap

      public static void updateInvoicesDateMap()
      Updates the map of invoices grouped by date. This method collects all invoices from the invoiceList and groups them by their date (LocalDate) into the invoicesGroupedByDate map.

    • updateReportList

      public static void updateReportList()
      Updates the list of reports based on the current list of invoices grouped by date. This method iterates through the entries in the invoicesGroupedByDate map, creates a new report for each date with the corresponding list of invoices, and updates the reportList with the new reports.
